sentences.en: And, this Valentines Day, pamper yourself.
sentences.cn: 最后，这个情人节，纵容一下自己。

sentences.en: Don't pamper damp scamp tramps that camp under ramp lamps.
sentences.cn: 不要纵容那些斜坡的街灯下露营的湿著身子的流浪街童.

sentences.en: Don't pamper scamp tramps that camp under ramp lamps.
sentences.cn: 不要纵容那些浑身湿漉漉的流氓在斜坡的路灯下践踏露营地.

sentences.en: Experience the most fitting and comfortable touch which is sure pamper you.
sentences.cn: 给您最舒爽的贴身感受,您一定会喜欢.

sentences.en: I love going to the beauty salon because they really pamper me.
sentences.cn: 我喜欢去美容院,因为他们实在是对我很好.

sentences.en: Kelly: So how will you pamper her?
sentences.cn: 凯莉: 那你打算为她做什么 呢 ?

sentences.en: o I can choose to pamper myself while I am in this unhappy place.
sentences.cn: 当我不幸福时，我可以选择纵容一下自己。

sentences.en: Opportunities to pamper yourself may unfold.
sentences.cn: 水瓶座:本周水瓶有纵容自己的机会.

sentences.en: Pamper yourself with our luxury gifts.
sentences.cn: 用我们的精美礼物宠爱一下自己吧。

sentences.en: Pamper yourself with our new range of beauty treatments.
sentences.cn: 尽情享受一下我们的新系列美容服务吧。

sentences.en: She spent her childhood as the pampered daughter of a wealthy family.
sentences.cn: 她出身于一个富裕家庭，从小娇生惯养。

sentences.en: So keep the precious compost for vegetables or any special plants you want to pamper!
sentences.cn: 这样你可以将宝贵的堆肥留给蔬菜,或你想特别培育的特殊植物!

sentences.en: They pamper themselves after a hard day at work.
sentences.cn: 他们劳累工作一日之后放纵自己.

sentences.en: You need to pamper yourself and let your charm come through.
sentences.cn: 你需要对自己放纵一些来表现你的魅力.

trans.tran_en: to look after someone very kindly, for example by giving them the things that they want and making them feel warm and comfortable

trans.tran_cn: 纵容， 娇惯； 精心护理
trans.tran_en: to look after someone very kindly, for example by giving them the things that they want and making them feel warm and comfortable
